name: Mini Table Foosball 18
description:
Mini Table Foosball 18 - Realistic and stylish, fast-paced foosball game. Improve your skills. Become the champion among all nations! Compete with friends in the challenging hot-seat mode.

-Best Gameplay
-Hyper-intuitives controls
-Top-class Artificial Intelligence, with 3 levels of difficulty
-Each victory gives you credits
